short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: eucm transfer cookies from a website to Surfly session on the fly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It watches for all successful browser navigations via webNavigation API and when it is detected, it reads all cookies via cookies API and migrates them to Surfly, applying Surfly proxification rules. As a result - you will never need to log in again!
